price: 167. Zij zeiden: “Als je niet stopt, O Loeth! Waarlijk, dan zul jij zeker behoren tot één van degenen die verdreven zullen worden!”
arabic: قَالُواْ لَئِن لَّمۡ تَنتَهِ يَٰلُوطُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُخۡرَجِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qālū la-in lam tantahi yālūṭu latakūnanna mina al-mukh'rajīna
